column5: Drive the next generation of audio technology with the help of this distinctive masters programme.Course descriptionDrive the next generation of audio technology with the help of this distinctive masters programme. Underpinned by pioneering research, excellent teaching and first-rate facilities, our MSc Audio Engineering equips you with the skills and knowledge valued most by employers in the rapidly changing and dynamic field of audio engineering.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
